metadata.title: CVE-2024-22513 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: djangorestframework-simplejwt version 5.3.1 and before is vulnerable toinformation disclosure. A user can access web application resources evenafter their account has been disabled due to missing user validation checksvia the for_user method.

criterions.comment: python-djangorestframework-simplejwt package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
